changeRepositionOverride.theText: Block access to the shipment and the extraction point.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You intercept the Imperial arms shipment as it winds through the Lothal markets. Your contact’s info was good. Adrenaline coursing, you pray he arrives at the extraction point on schedule.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} When a hero withdraws, they are incapacitated instead. When activating, they receive only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.

eventActions.theText: The shipment is heavy, but the repulsor sled makes moving it at least possible.
{-} The Imperial mission token represents the shipment. Once during their activation, a hero on or adjacent to the shipment may push the shipment 1 space.
Your contact gave you very specific coordinates where you need to bring the shipment.

entityProperties.name: Extraction Point
entityProperties.theText:
Your contact's ship is waiting here.

{-} When the shipment enters this space, click "Shipment extracted".

eventActions.theText:
{-} The Rebel mission token represents the extraction point. When the shipment enters the extraction point, click the token and select "Shipment extracted".
{-} The mission will progress when the shipment is extracted.
{-} If the round limit is enabled, the mission ends at the end of Round 4 if the shipment is not extracted, at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.
Take the shipment to the extraction point.

{-} When a hero withdraws, they are incapacitated instead. When activating, they receive only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The Imperial mission token represents the shipment. Once during their activation, a hero on or adjacent to the shipment may push the shipment 1 space.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents the extraction point. When the shipment enters the extraction point, click the token and select "Shipment extracted".
{-} The mission will progress when the shipment is extracted.
{-} If the round limit is enabled, the mission ends at the end of Round 4 if the shipment is not extracted, at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
A shuttle floats overhead. A man with a green mask covering the upper half of his face helps you through the rear hatch. “Welcome aboard the Phantom.”

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Rebel players choose 1 hero to receive the “Nova Cell Leader” Reward card.

eventActions.theText: Are you playing this mission as part of the "Tyrants of Lothal" mini campaign?

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Explosions erupt among the grasses, barely missing you. A figure in Mandalorian armor throws a few more grenades from a shuttle before dropping a rope for you.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.

eventActions.theText: Are you playing this mission as part of the "Tyrants of Lothal" mini campaign?

globalEvents.name: Mini campaign Win
globalEvents.eventText:
"Ezra, take us back to the Ghost," the man with the mask says to the younger man at the shuttles controls. "My name is Kanan Jarrus. I didn’t know there were any rebels left on Lothal."

You tell him you have only just begun to fight the Empire. "You've started down a hard path," he says at last, “but you have an ally in the Spectres. We'll show you what you need to know."

"Just don't count on it being easy," Ezra adds. “Kanan doesn't teach easy.”

{-} Each hero receives 2 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 300 credits per hero.
{-} Heroes receive <color="red">Kanan Jarrus</color> (Spectre-1), <color="red">Zeb Orrelios</color> (Spectre-4), <color="red">Sabine Wren</color> (Spectre-5), and <color="red">Ezra Bridger</color> (Spectre-6) as allies. Heroes also receive <color="red">Hera Syndulla</color> (Spectre-2) and <color="red">C1-10P</color> (“Chopper”) as allies if they have the Hera Syndulla and C1-10P  Ally Pack.

eventActions.theText:
Please select the correct option below.

{-} Extended campaign: I'm playing the extended mini campaign with the Hondo Ohnaka Villain Pack.
{-} Mini campaign: I'm playing the regular "Tyrants of Lothal" mini campaign without the Villain Pack.

globalEvents.name: Mini campaign Defeat
globalEvents.eventText:
“Youre not really a fan of subtlety, are you?” the girl says. “I'm Sabine. Thats Zeb.” She motions toward the big Lasat crammed into the pilot's seat. “Let's go!”

Zeb shoots her a glare. “We're not really taking them back to the Ghost,” he growls and grits his teeth. “They probably have no idea what they're doing.”

Sabine drops into the copilot seat. “They have to learn somehow! Who better to teach them than us?”

{-} Each hero receives 2 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 300 credits per hero.
{-} Heroes receive <color="red">Kanan Jarrus</color> (Spectre-1), <color="red">Zeb Orrelios</color> (Spectre-4), <color="red">Sabine Wren</color> (Spectre-5), and <color="red">Ezra Bridger</color> (Spectre-6) as allies. Heroes also receive <color="red">Hera Syndulla</color> (Spectre-2) and <color="red">C1-10P</color> (“Chopper”) as allies if they have the Hera Syndulla and C1-10P  Ally Pack.

eventActions.theText:
Please select the correct option below.

{-} Extended campaign: I'm playing the extended mini campaign with the Hondo Ohnaka Villain Pack.
{-} Mini campaign: I'm playing the regular "Tyrants of Lothal" mini campaign without the Villain Pack.

globalEvents.name: No campaign
globalEvents.eventText:
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Extended campaign 1
globalEvents.eventText:
As the Phantom carries you to your own ship, your comlink chirps. The cool voice of your local contact, N-4M, carries through. “I should have vetted Mr. Ohnaka more thoroughly,” he concedes. The droid’s vocabulator whirrs and stutters. “Fortunately, my informants have seen Mr. Ohnaka boarding a ship to leave. I can transmit his probable destination.”

You tell your saviors you need to make a detour before meeting the rest of their group, and they offer to send someone to help. You have some unfinished business with Hondo Ohnaka...

{-} The next active mission is “The Pirate's Ploy” (Hondo Ohnaka Villain Pack).

globalEvents.name: Regular mini campaign
globalEvents.eventText:
You dock with a VCX-100 freighter. Once aboard, you meet the rest of the crew, including Captain Hera Syndulla. “We can use all the help we can get,” she says, “and if my people trust you, so do I. We've got more work to do than people to do it.

“Have you heard of Grand Admiral Thrawn? He’s got the whole sector on high alert. We can barely move.” She leans against the small table in the middle of the room. “We have allies on Seelos, Wolffe and Gregor, who have salvaged some Imperial codes from a stolen walker, but they need a hand escaping the Empire. We've also got a lead on an old smuggler’s hideout on Devaron containing charts of the best smuggling routes through the sector. If we can get them, we can dodge Imperial patrols and won't need codes at all.” She turns to you. “If you can help us out here, I'll send one of my crew along.”

{-} The heroes collectively choose whether to assist Wolffe and Gregor or investigate the smuggler’s hideout.
{-} If the heroes choose to assist Wolffe and Gregor, the next active mission is “Sands of Seelos”.
{-} If the heroes choose to investigate the smuggler’s hideout, the next active mission is “Duel on Devaron”.

globalEvents.name: Just Business
globalEvents.eventText:
Your contact, Hondo Ohnaka, grins as he pulls the shipment aboard his ship. “Very good, my friends!” The ship begins to rise before you can climb aboard. “Unfortunately, I was offered a better deal.” Hondo points his blaster at you as more Imperials arrive.

{-} Discard the shipment.

entityProperties.name: Extraction Point
entityProperties.theText:
Your contact's ship is waiting here.

{-} When the shipment enters this space, click "Shipment extracted".

eventActions.theText:
A voice crackles over your com. “Any enemy of the Empire is a friend of ours. Hold on, we're coming!”

Far in the distance, you can see a ship descending through Lothal's atmosphere towards nearby hill-strewn fields.
"We can't get a reading on your position," comes the voice over com. "There should be some old signal flares down there. Find them and light one, then you only need to hold out until we're with you!"

entityProperties.name: Flare 1
entityProperties.theText:
An old signal flare is hidden in the tall grass.

{-} A healthy hero can interact with a flare to light it.

entityProperties.name: Flare 2
entityProperties.theText:
An old signal flare is hidden in the tall grass.

{-} A healthy hero can interact with a flare to light it.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent flares. A healthy hero can interact with a flare to light it.
{-} During Round 6, at the start of the Status Phase, if all heroes are on the Fields (tile Lothal 1B + endcaps) and a flare has been lit, the heroes depart. (If the round limit is disabled, the heroes can depart at later rounds.)
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes depart.
Block access to the Fields and the flares.
Get on the Fields and light a flare.

{-} When a hero withdraws, they are incapacitated instead. When activating, they receive only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent flares. A healthy hero can interact with a flare to light it. During Round 6, at the start of the Status Phase, if all heroes are on the Fields (tile Lothal 1B + endcaps) and a flare has been lit, the heroes depart. (If the round limit is disabled, the heroes can depart at later rounds.)
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes depart.

globalEvents.name: Through the Grasses
globalEvents.eventText: With a hiss and extended claws, small, but fierce creatures rush through the grasses.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose EoR 4
globalEvents.eventText:
Explosions erupt among the grasses, barely missing you. A figure in Mandalorian armor throws a few more grenades from a shuttle before dropping a rope for you.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.

globalEvents.name: Deadly Reinforcements
globalEvents.eventText: As the mysterious freighter approaches to extract you, you see a tall, black-armored figure stalking you through the grass.

globalEvents.name: Flare lit
globalEvents.eventText:
It is done. The signal flare is lit. All you have to do now is hold out until extraction.

{-} During Round 6, at the start of the Status Phase, if all heroes are on the Fields (tile Lothal 1B + endcaps), the heroes depart. (If the round limit is disabled, the heroes can depart at later rounds.)

eventActions.theText: Get on the Fields and hold your ground until the end of Round 6.
